## IConfigTsdocMetadata interface

Configures how the tsdoc-metadata.json file will be generated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConfigTsdocMetadata 
```

## Remarks

This is part of the [IConfigFile](./api-extractor.iconfigfile.md) structure.
